articles.description: The England manager praised the ruthless Three Lions as they dispatched of Republic of Ireland - but will be without Conor Coady for Sunday's crucial clash in Belgium following a Covid scare.
articles.content:
Gareth Southgate praised ruthless England as they dispatched of Republic of Ireland - but will be without Conor Coady for Sundays crucial clash in Belgium following a Covid scare.

articles.author: Chris Foy
articles.title: As Jack Willis gets nod for debut, Eddie Jones' verdict on freakish flanker... he's flipping tough - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jack Willis was named at openside flanker by coach Eddie Jones for the national team's Autumn Nations Cup opener. It comes on the back of the stunning club form for Wasps.
articles.content:
Jack Willis was acclaimed on Thursday as 'flipping tough' and flipping flexible, too after being picked for a well-deserved England debut against Georgia on Saturday.

articles.author: By Jack Elsom Sam Blitz David Wilcock For Mailonline
articles.title: Fury as England team are given special permission to take on Iceland at Wembley next week - Daily Mail
articles.description: Iceland's squad has been given special dispensation to fly from Copenhagen for next Wednesday's Nation's League fixture against Gareth Southgate's men at Wembley.
articles.content:
Ministers have sparked uproar after allowing Iceland's national football team to swerve the UK's travel ban on people coming from coronavirus-hit Denmark.

articles.title: Patrick Vieira's comments on Arsenal's Granit Xhaka have eventually been proved right - Mirror Online
articles.description: Twelve months ago, Granit Xhaka was going through a turbulent time at Arsenal and one of the few voices of support for him came from club legend Patrick Vieira
